text: “Goodou gii noho kanakana, idimaa, goodou ga lawalawa go nia daangada gaa lahi gi di gowaa hai gabunga. Goodou ga haga mamaawa i lodo nia synagogee gaa lahi gi mua nia king i dogu gili, bolo goodou gi haga modongoohia ina gi digaula di hai o di Longo Humalia.13.9 Matthew 10.17-20; Luke 12.11-12
